buyingLocal.title: Why Buy Local?
buyingLocal.subtitle: Every purchase from a local artisan strengthens your community, preserves traditional crafts, and creates meaningful connections that go far beyond the transaction.
buyingLocal.benefitsTitle: The Benefits of Supporting Local Artisans
buyingLocal.benefitsSubtitle: When you choose local, you're not just buying a product—you're investing in people, craftsmanship, and community.

supportArtisans.title: Support Local Artisans
supportArtisans.description: Your purchases directly support local artisans, craftspeople, and small business owners, helping them sustain their livelihoods and preserve their traditional crafts.

authenticQuality.title: Authentic Handcrafted Quality
authenticQuality.description: Each product is carefully handcrafted with attention to detail, ensuring unique, high-quality items you won't find anywhere else.

environmental.title: Reduce Environmental Impact
environmental.description: Shorter transportation distances and sustainable practices mean fewer carbon emissions, less packaging waste, and a smaller environmental footprint.

community.title: Build Community Connections
community.description: Meet the artisans behind your purchases, learn their stories, and become part of a vibrant local community network.

traditionalCrafts.title: Preserve Traditional Crafts
traditionalCrafts.description: Local artisans use time-honored techniques passed down through generations, creating products with cultural significance and superior craftsmanship.

economy.title: Strengthen Local Economy
economy.description: Money spent on local artisans circulates within the community, creating jobs and fostering economic growth right where you live.

buyingLocal.impactSubtitle: Every purchase from a local artisan creates ripples throughout the community

stats.communityMoney: More money stays in your community when you buy local
stats.carbonFootprint: Less carbon footprint compared to mass-produced goods
stats.authenticProducts: Authentic handcrafted products from local makers
stats.directConnection: Connection with artisans and their craft stories

buyingLocal.howToSupportSubtitle: Getting started is easy—and every small action makes a big difference
buyingLocal.readyMessage: Explore our marketplace to discover talented local artisans and their amazing handcrafted products. Every purchase makes a real difference in someone's life and strengthens your community.
buyingLocal.joinMessage: Every time you choose to support a local artisan, you're preserving traditions, sustaining livelihoods, and building a stronger, more connected community.

howItWorks.title: How BazaarMkt Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Connecting local artisans with their communities. Simple, transparent, and designed to support local makers.
howItWorks.shoppersSubtitle: Discover authentic, handcrafted products from local artisans in your community
howItWorks.artisansSubtitle: Start selling your handcrafted products and grow your business

transparency.title: Revenue & Payouts
transparency.subtitle: Complete transparency in how revenue is shared, when you get paid, and how you can track every dollar you earn
transparency.revenueSubtitle: For every $100 in sales, here's exactly how the revenue is distributed
transparency.walletSubtitle: Your earnings are automatically tracked and paid out on a reliable schedule
transparency.joinCommunity: Join our community of artisans and start building your business with complete transparency

dashboardHighlights.title: Artisan Dashboard Benefits
dashboardHighlights.subtitle: Everything you need to manage and grow your artisan business, all in one powerful dashboard
dashboardHighlights.visibilitySubtitle: Your artisan dashboard provides comprehensive insights and tools to manage every aspect of your business

revenueAnalytics.title: Revenue Analytics
revenueAnalytics.description: Track your sales performance with detailed analytics including daily, weekly, and monthly revenue trends.

orderManagement.title: Order Management
orderManagement.description: Efficiently manage all your orders in one place with real-time notifications and status updates.

walletEarnings.title: Wallet & Earnings
walletEarnings.description: Monitor your earnings, pending balance, and payout history with complete transparency.

productAnalytics.title: Product Analytics
productAnalytics.description: Understand which products perform best and optimize your inventory accordingly.

customerInsights.title: Customer Insights
customerInsights.description: Learn about your customers and their purchasing patterns to grow your business.

notifications.title: Real-time Notifications
notifications.description: Stay informed with instant notifications for new orders, reviews, and important updates.

dashboardHighlights.analyticsSubtitle: Make data-driven decisions with beautiful, easy-to-understand charts and reports
dashboardHighlights.readyTitle: Ready to Start Your Artisan Journey?
dashboardHighlights.readySubtitle: Join our community of local artisans and get access to all these powerful tools to grow your business

community.title: Community
community.beFirst: Be the first to share something!
